price: (13) The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
